epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and ensure data security
epics.description: Develop a secure login system incorporating multi-factor authentication to protect user accounts. Ensure all sensitive financial data is protected using industry-standard encryption methods. Implement comprehensive security measures to prevent unauthorized access.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services
epics.description: Design and implement a personalized dashboard that displays relevant banking products and services based on the customer's profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard is user-friendly and provides a seamless experience.

epics.title: Account Management
epics.summary: Enable account management and service modification
epics.description: Develop features that allow users to submit account opening requests and modify existing services through a streamlined, minimal-click workflow. Ensure real-time status updates and email notifications are sent regarding submitted requests.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Implement a system to keep a detailed record of all user interactions with the portal. Ensure that transaction history is easily accessible and secure, providing transparency and traceability for the user.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design that provides a consistent user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Optimize the portalâ€™s interface for different screen sizes to ensure usability and accessibility.

epics.title: Incomplete Application Handling
epics.summary: Allow users to save and return to incomplete applications
epics.description: Create functionality that lets users save incomplete applications and return to them later. Ensure users can easily upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, making the application process more convenient.

epics.title: System Integration and Database Management
epics.summary: Integrate with core banking system while maintaining a separate database
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the portal with the bank's existing core banking system. Develop and maintain a separate database to optimize performance and reliability of the portal. Facilitate robust data synchronization between systems.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Implement a robust role-based access control system to ensure customers can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. Establish strict access policies to enhance security and compliance.
